column5: Thanks once again everyone, as I said previously, your a great group.  My wife took me out for dinner last night and when I walked into the restaurant, there sat a whole table of my best friends for a surprise B-Day party.  Can't beat a room full of good friends !!
Happy Birthday Lew !!  In today's metric world, you take your age and divide by 2.2 That puts you about 22.7 years old.
Belated happy birthday Lew.
Just in from the Quinte trip and saw this thread.  Hope you had a great birthday Lew!!
Jeez, I don't log in for a couple of days and I miss Lew's 65th! Well, HAPPY BIRTHDAY BUDDY!!! I see the missus did something special for ya. Congrats Lew, all the best to you!
Happy Birthday Lew!  and a pinch to grow an inch.     What a wonderful time for a birthday.   Kinda between seasons (hard and soft)  Have an excellent dayB)
happy b day lew !!!! i wouldnt have put you a day over 30 !!!!!
Happy B'day my friend, glad you enjoyed the "surprise dinner"!! 65 years young and going strong!!
Again, I'll thank everyone for their well wishes, very much !!   Sorry you missed the party Pete, it was alot of fun, but I sure did appreciate the VERY long distance phone call.
Happy Birthday Lewski!
Happy B'day Lew, best wishes and many repeats.
Happy Birthday Lew  Here's to many more
happy bd lew
Happy Birthday Lew and many more to you buddy.   Art
Geesh, a good thing you are in great shape still Lew.... with that many candles an all on a cake!  Hope you had a great day Lew.  Cheers and heres to many many more!  Cheers, Ron...
Many happy returns Lew.
Happy Birthday Lew !!
Even tho ur not my friend Happy Birthday Lew
Happy Birth day ya old fart !
Happy Birthday old man,make sure you get a burn permit before you light up that birthday cake. Joe
Happy Birthday Lew    Hope you had a great one

Lew...reading through this thread I've seen you've had some of the best Birthday wishes anyone could ask for!  So...be grateful for having the people in your life wanting to give them...but above all...be grateful for being the kind of person that makes people want to give them!  Happy Birthday Lew!
Happy Birthday my Friend! Hope you had a good one!
Thanks once again all !!
I see you're getting up even earlier now that you retired!
Sleeping's bad for your health Dax
You're right ya know...  Years ago I would get grand and glorious drunk but wake up with a horrendous hangover...  Which goes to prove that sleeping can't be good for you...
Happy belated Lew
better late than never, happy belated and I hope you had a good one Lew.
i missed the day of your birthday to wish you all the best so consider this early for the next event....  Merry Christmas
I have some good news for all the 'belated wishes' folks. Lew's actual birthday is tomorrow.
Happy bday brudder!
Happy Birthday Lew, 50"ers are common for an old Pro. Heres wishing you one your age  .
Happy Birthday Lew!
How does it feel to finally be the age of retirement   Hope you have a super day hon!!!!!   HAPPY BIRTHDAY
Happy Birthday to you Lew. As Joey says, you can finally, after all these years, retire.  Have a super day!
Thanks guys, I'm really looking forward to retirement  Gonna be nice to finally fish for free too
Happy Birthday from over this way to Lew , i never would of guessed from your avatar picture you were that close , enjoy my friend .
happy birthday Lew...  now go get a 50 incher to celebrate...
have a great birthday Lew
Time to cash in those checks!!!  Happy Birthday bud!
Happy Birthday Lew!!!  Have a great day!!   Peps
Happy Birthday Lew.  Make plans for many more.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY LEW !!!  CHEERS !
Happy birthday Lew....
HB Lew
All the best for your birthday my friend...  Soon the government will send you your senior citizen card just to remind you that you're getting older...
You know how the saying goes. When your retired every day is a Saturday morning or something..
Happy Birthday Lew, now you can enjoy all the discounts that go with getting old   Have a great day  Maureen
Happy Birthday Lew Cheers
Have a great day Lew. Happy birthday.
Lew !!!!! No way you're retirement age !!!!! Yer just a young buck !!  Happy Birthday Bud !!!   Paul
Happy Birthday Lew...don't be so serious....try smiling in some of those fish pictures   lol
Hope you have a great one Lew.   Dinner out tonite eh ?
Happy Birthday Lew.
Wow, retirement age, eh?  You'll wanna get your candles at the dollar store cuz you need a lot!  Very Happy Birthday wishes to ya, Lew.
Happy BD  Lew and many more to come, with a generous smattering of ol esox mixed in there as well of course
Thanks for all the B-Day wishes folks, your a good group !!
All the very best to you Lew and welcome to the seniors club!
